description: Handle data sources returning empty datasets.
Process data with missing 'enriched' column in ServiceB.
APIClient should handle unexpected HTTP status codes.
Model prediction with input data containing NaN values.
Utilities should process unknown data types gracefully.
DataProcessor should handle DataFrame with only NaN values.
Validate proper exception handling when external API is down.
ServiceA should handle division by zero errors.
DataSource should raise an error for unsupported file formats.
Model should handle input data with extreme values without crashing.
